T02D3213:217b-1: ku ru kulle s'a dha nam /
T02D3213:217b-4: ku ru kulle la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3213:217b-5: dang por sngags pas bde ba'i stan la nye bar gnas la ;
T02D3213:217b-6: snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis mdun du
T02D3213:217b-7: bcom ldan 'das ma sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D3213:217b-8: dpa' rnams kyang spyan drangs te legs par mchod la
T02D3213:217b-9: skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa rnams bya ba'o
T02D3213:217b-10: // de nas stong pa nyid du mos par byas te /
T02D3213:218a-2: yi ge aam las yang dag par byung ba'i zla
T02D3213:218a-3: ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge tam 'od zer gyi
T02D3213:218a-4: phreng ba dang ldan par rnam par bsams te /
T02D3213:218a-5: de dag yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das
T02D3213:218a-6: ma ku ru kuller ba blta bar bya ba ni
T02D3213:218a-7: padma dang nyi ma dmar po'i gdan la rdo rje'i
T02D3213:218a-8: skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02D3213:218a-10: g-yas pa dang g-yon pa'i phyag dang po gnyis ni
T02D3213:218a-11: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya mdzad pa
T02D3213:218a-12: / g-yas dang g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis pa dag gis ni lcags kyu dang /
T02D3213:218a-14: / phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis ni mda' gzhu rna ba'i drung du 'gengs par mdzad pa /
T02D3213:218a-15: na bza' dmar po bsnams pa /
T02D3213:218a-16: dbu rgyan la de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ste /
T02D3213:218a-17: bsgrub bya'i snying ga'i autpala dmar po'i lte ba'i zla
T02D3213:218a-18: ba'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge t'am dmar po rnam
T02D3213:218a-19: par bsgoms la ; rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon zhing snying lcags kyus phug la bkug ste /
T02D3213:218a-20: de'i snying la nye bar zhugs la autpala dmar po'i
T02D3213:218a-21: mda' mde'us bsgrub bya yang dang yang du phug cing
T02D3213:218a-23: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
T02D3213:218a-24: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: che ge mo bdag gi dbang du sgrubs ho: sv'a h'a /
T02D3213:218a-25: de nas rnam par myos shing dbang du gyur pas
T02D3213:218a-26: rkang pa gnyis la nges par gtugs par byed pa
T02D3213:218a-27: de bltas la bskur bar bya ste /
T02D3213:218a-28: de ltar gyis ni brgya byin yang dbang du 'du bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3213:218a-29: 'di ni ku ru kulle'i sgrub thabs so //
